greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: G.f.: exp( Sum_{n>=1} -sigma(3n)*x^n/n ).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: G.f.: E(x)^4/E(x^3) where E(x) = Product_{n>=1} (1-x^n). [From a formula by _Joerg Arndt_ in A182819]
Expansion of E(x) * E(x*w) * E(x/w) in powers of x^3 where w = exp(2 Pi i / 3). - _Michael Somos_, Jul 12 2018
mathematica: a[ n_] := SeriesCoefficient[ QPochhammer[ x]^4 / QPochhammer[ x^3], {x, 0, n}]; (* _Michael Somos_, Jul 12 2018 *)
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Feb 16 2011
